i.name: Easom
i.latex: f_{\text{Easom}}(\mathbf{x}) = a - \frac{a}{e^{b \sqrt{\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i^{2}}{n}}}} + e - e^{\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n} \cos\left(c x_i\right)}{n}}

i.name: Zacharov
i.latex: f_{\text{Zacharov}}(\mathbf{x}) = \sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i^2 + \left ( \frac{1}{2} \sum_{i=1}^{n} i x_i \right )^2 + \left ( \frac{1}{2} \sum_{i=1}^{n} i x_i \right )^4

i.name: Langermann
i.latex: f_{\text{Langermann}}(\mathbf{x}) = - \sum_{i=1}^{5} \frac{c_i \cos\left\{\pi \left[\left(x_{1}- a_i\right)^{2} + \left(x_{2} - b_i \right)^{2}\right]\right\}}{e^{\frac{\left( x_{1} - a_i\right)^{2} + \left( x_{2} - b_i\right)^{2}}{\pi}}}
